author: COMSOL
description: This example simulates a simplified model of a horizontal-axis portable washing machine and predicts the onset of walking instability during the spinning cycle. Rotational slip of the machine, which is a critical design concern, is analyzed and a control-based active balancing method is also described to eliminate the instability and vibrations present in the system.
